Html:
Hi Radioman!

Im developing in gmap.net with files 1.5.5.5 (april 26, i think...). Gmap.net.core.dll file size is just 168kb.

Now, 'cause im having some troubles in routing (routes generated with GetRouteBetweenPoints are irregular/strange) im updating the dlls, but i observe now gmap.net.core now have 2Mb! it is correct?  O_o

Greetings from Venezuela.

 

BernieSF
it's incorrect, latest version size is 2.09 MB, it's because it has embedded sqlite dlls

I assume then i can remove the system.data.sqlite reference.

Thanks radioman!
yes, you don't need to reference it, because it's inside anyway
